versacegiftstore.motto: " Our Gift Cards and Your Choices. Perfect combination. "
versacegiftstore.information_store: We have tied up with 8 global brands. Get discount on purchase with these eight brands using our different gift cards.
versacegiftstore.promo: Buy the limited Special Edition Gift Card worth $1000 in $800. Hurry up and get it!!

phcard_general_info.name: Versace Special Edition GiftCard
phcard_general_info.accepted_location: Accepted on: Multiple platforms of all of our partner stores.
phcard_general_info.valid_area: Locations: In all the physical branches of the four chain stores all over the globe and the e-commerce sites.
phcard_general_info.benefit: Description: You will get upto 20% discounts on all the stores and services of Dominos, Apple, Adidas, Dunkin, Amazon.com, Alibaba, eBay, Walmart depending on total amount. Interesting fact about this card is the only card at Versace GiftStore that ensures discount in both physical and online stores.

sp_card_info.associated_brand: Brands Associated: Dominos, Apple, Adidas, Dunkin,Amazon,Walmart,ebay
sp_card_info.availability: Remaining cards: Only 60 Special Edition cards are available with us.
sp_card_info.spmessage: This card offers you lifetime membership with us with only $100 as the minimal renewal fees per annum.Using promocode above gives you discount on online purchases while this card will give you discount on physical stores.

phcard_general_info.name: Premium Edition GiftCard
phcard_general_info.accepted_location: Accepted on: Multiple physical platforms of our food chain, gadgets and apparels stores.
phcard_general_info.valid_area: Locations: All the stores of our partners in UK, USA, India, Malaysia, Dubai, HongKong and China.
phcard_general_info.benefit: Description: You will get a VIP discount on all the locations of Dominos, Dunkin, Adidas and Apple stores.The card will have access in almost 7 different countries. Special offers will be notified to you sooner or later. Free Card reload on special occassions.

phadd_card_info.discount: Estimated Discount: Upto 15% on every purchase depending on total amount
phadd_card_info.type: Card Type: Physical (Only accepted on physical purchases in stores).

phcard_general_info.name: Platinum Edition GiftCard
phcard_general_info.accepted_location: Accepted on: Multiple physical platforms of our food chains and apparels stores.
phcard_general_info.valid_area: Locations: All the stores of our partners in UK, USA, India, Malaysia and Dubai.
phcard_general_info.benefit: Description: You will get a fair discount on all the locations mentioned. The card will have access in 5 different countries. You will get discounts on Dominos, Dunkin and Adidas. Special offers will be offered to you on special occassions.

phadd_card_info.discount: Estimated Discount: upto 10% on every purchase depending on total amount
phadd_card_info.type: Card Type: Physical (Only accepted on physical purchases in stores).

phcard_general_info.name: Regular Edition GiftCard
phcard_general_info.accepted_location: Accepted on: Certain physical platforms of our food chains and clothing stores.
phcard_general_info.valid_area: Location: Only in the boundary of the United Kingdom.
phcard_general_info.benefit: Description: You will get discount in Adidas, Dominos and Dunkin stores. However, this card will have access only within the boundary of United Kingdom only. No special offers will be offered to you except on our birth anniversary.

phadd_card_info.discount: 5% Discount are available only in weekends on purchases.
phadd_card_info.type: Card Type: Physical (Only accepted on physical purchases in stores).

dgcard_info.name: VIP Digital Voucher
dgcard_info.inform: Point on blurred text for coupon code.
dgcard_info.accepted_location: Accepted on: Global e-commerce platforms which includes Amazon, Walmart and eBay.
dgcard_info.discount: Estimated discount: upto 20% discount in e-store depending on total amount
dgcard_info.benefit: Use gift card coupon code and get heavy discounts. Save more with our vouchers and cards. Amazon, eBay and Walmart awaits to offer you discounts.

dgcard_info.name: Special Digital Voucher
dgcard_info.inform: Point on blurred text for coupon code.
dgcard_info.accepted_location: Accepted on: Global e-commerce platforms which includes Amazon, Walmart and eBay.
dgcard_info.discount: Estimated discount: upto 15% discount on orders depending on total amount
dgcard_info.benefit: Use coupon codes and get heavy discounts. Save more with our vouchers and cards. Amazon, eBay and Walmart offers discounts on every purchase until the date of expiry.

dgcard_info.name: Regular Digital Voucher
dgcard_info.inform: Point on blurred text for coupon code.
dgcard_info.accepted_location: Accepted on: Global e-commerce platforms which includes Amazon, Walmart and eBay.
dgcard_info.discount: Estimated discount: upto 5% discount on orders depending on total amount
dgcard_info.benefit: Use coupon codes and get heavy discounts. Save more with our vouchers and cards. Get fair discounts on purchases on Amazon, eBay and Walmart. Highly recommendable for students.

footer.reachout_message: Want gift card? Connect with us.
